In a world where animals can take on human-like forms, a fox named Kaito is born without a tail. He struggles to fit in with his peers, who tease him for his unusual appearance. One day, Kaito discovers he has the ability to manipulate the memories of those around him, allowing him to alter their perceptions of him. He uses this power to change how others see him, gradually gaining acceptance and respect from his community.

In a post-apocalyptic future, a group of survivors must band together to rebuild society. Among them is a young woman named Aria, who possesses the ability to communicate with animals. As she navigates the treacherous new world, Aria discovers that the animals she interacts with hold the key to unlocking the secrets of the past and the future. With their help, she must unravel the mysteries of the apocalypse and lead her people to a brighter tomorrow.

In a world where magic is a part of everyday life, a young apprentice named Eira discovers she has the ability to see and manipulate the threads of fate that connect all living beings. As she learns to harness her power, Eira becomes embroiled in a web of intrigue and deception, where powerful forces seek to exploit her abilities for their own gain. With the help of her mentor and a group of unlikely allies, Eira must navigate the complex world of magic and politics to uncover the truth about her past and her destiny.

In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, a gifted "memory thief" named Lyra is tasked with stealing a powerful memory from a wealthy client. However, as she delves deeper into the memory, Lyra discovers that it holds the key to a long-forgotten tragedy that has haunted her own family for generations. With the help of a ragtag group of allies, Lyra must navigate the underworld of memory trading and uncover the truth about her family's past in order to prevent a catastrophic future.

In a world where dreams are a shared experience, a young lucid dreamer named Zephyr discovers he has the ability to enter and manipulate the dreams of others. As he explores the surreal landscapes of the dream world, Zephyr becomes embroiled in a battle between rival factions vying for control of the collective unconscious. With the help of a mysterious guide and a group of allies, Zephyr must navigate the ever-changing world of dreams to prevent a catastrophic invasion of the waking world.
